markdown:
<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 1"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Seasoned](/Feats.aspx?ID=5210) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="General" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=78" />
<trait label="Skill" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=144" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [Player Core](/Sources.aspx?ID=216) pg. 262 <sup>2.0</sup>

**Prerequisites**
Trained in [Alcohol Lore](/Skills.aspx?ID=8), Trained in [Cooking Lore](/Skills.aspx?ID=8), or Trained in [Crafting](/Skills.aspx?ID=4)

</column>

---

You’ve mastered the preparation of many types of food and drink. You gain a +1 circumstance bonus to checks to Craft food and drink, including elixirs if you have Alchemical Crafting and potions if you have Magical Crafting. If you are a master in one of the prerequisite skills, this bonus increases to +2.
name: Seasoned
prerequisite: Trained in Alcohol Lore, Trained in Cooking Lore, or Trained in Crafting
prerequisite_markdown: Trained in [Alcohol Lore](/Skills.aspx?ID=8), Trained in [Cooking Lore](/Skills.aspx?ID=8), or Trained in [Crafting](/Skills.aspx?ID=4)

text: <title level="1" right="Feat 1" pfs="Standard" > Seasoned Source Player Core pg. 262 2.0 Prerequisites Trained in Alcohol Lore, Trained in Cooking Lore, or Trained in Crafting --- You’ve mastered the preparation of many types of food and drink. You gain a +1 circumstance bonus to checks to Craft food and drink, including elixirs if you have Alchemical Crafting and potions if you have Magical Crafting.
